## Summary
Admins can lock timesheets to prevent edits after a cutoff date.

## Canonical answer
To lock timesheets, open Workspace Settings > Timesheets and enable the lock with your desired cutoff date.

## Body
Locking ensures no one can change entries before the lock date. Unlock temporarily if adjustments are needed then lock again.

## Key points
- Only workspace admins can lock timesheets.
- Applies to all members in the workspace.

## Limits & gotchas
- Locked entries cannot be edited until you unlock.
- Past periods should be reviewed before locking.

## FAQ
- *Can managers lock timesheets?* No, only workspace admins.

## Search hints
timesheet lock cutoff prevent edits

## Internal notes
If users report missing edits, verify the lock date and role permissions.
